feed.title: Cicada Documentation
feed.subtitle: Cicada - Documentation for a tiny web framework

entry.title: General fixes and improvements
entry.content:
This release fixes a few minor issues reported by users. We’ve also made a few quality of life improvements.

Features:

  • Streamlined access to contact details
  • Better sort order for archived messages

Fixes:

  • Input sometimes getting stuck
  • One more memory leak obliterated
entry.summary:
This release fixes a few minor issues reported by users. We’ve also made a few quality of life improvements.
Features:
Streamlined access to contact details Better sort order for archived messages
Fixes:
Input sometimes getting stuck One more memory leak obliterated

entry.title: Media support
entry.content:
ChatApp introduces media support! Send images, videos and documents to your contacts.

Features:

  • Image support
  • Video support
  • Document support

Fixes:

  • Edge case contact syncing issue
  • All memory leaks obliterated
entry.summary:
ChatApp introduces media support! Send images, videos and documents to your contacts.
Features:
Image support Video support Document support
Fixes:
Edge case contact syncing issue All memory leaks obliterated
